description:
Improve your vegetable garden's health and productivity

The Veggie Garden Plan offers a specialized approach to vegetable gardening, featuring our Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Nutrients and Soil Booster for optimal growth and health. Together, they ensure your veggie garden grows healthy, nutritious produce each year with our annual subscription.

sections.standard_annual_plan_highlights:
Enhanced vegetable growth with 5-4-4 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Fertilizer
Improved soil health from Organic Soil Booster, rich in nutrients and microbes
Eco-friendly gardening with natural, sustainable formulations
Made for all types of veggie gardens, including vegetable and herb gardens
User-friendly , with a hose-end garden sprayer for easy application
Up to 200 sq. ft. coverage , perfect for small to medium-sized gardens
sections.whats_included:
Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Fertilizer: Tailored nutrition for vegetables, herbs and tomatoes
Sunday Organics Soil Booster Soil Amendment: Optimizes soil health and nutrient absorption
sections.instructions:
Apply Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Nutrients at the time of planting, following the instructions on the label.
Attach the hose-end sprayer to Soil Booster and connect it to the hose. Apply Soil Boost to prepared soil or existing garden beds, following the instructions on the label.
Reapply Soil Booster up to once per week and Veggie & Tomato Plant Food Mix every 4-6 weeks throughout the growing season.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How do annual plans work?
Sunday’s Veggie Garden Plan is a comprehensive kit in one simple shipment delivered annually.
Is the Veggie Kit suitable for all types of vegetables?
Yes, our Veggie Kit is designed to cater to a wide range of vegetables, providing them with the nutrients they need for healthy growth.
How often should I use the Soil Boost and Veggie & Tomato Plant Food?
Apply the Veggie & Tomato Plant Food every 4-6 weeks. Use Soil Booster at least three times during the growing season, up to once per week for optimal growth and microbial benefits.
Are these products safe for edible plants?
Absolutely! The Veggie & Tomato Plant Food and Soil Booster are safe and effective for use on edible plants, ensuring a bountiful harvest that’s ready to consume.
